title: Translation of "vaccination" into Spanish
description: Check 'vaccination' translations into Spanish. Look through examples of vaccination translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
text:
Translation of "vaccination" into Spanish
vacunación, vacuna, inoculación are the top translations of "vaccination" into Spanish. Sample translated sentence: The vaccination left a funny little mark on my arm. ↔ La vacuna me dejó una marquita rara en el brazo.
Inoculation with a vaccine in order to protect a particular disease or strain of disease [..]
[+ Add translation Add](/add-translation?l1=en&l2=es&phrase.l1Text=vaccination)vaccination
English-Spanish dictionary
-
vacunación
inoculation with a vaccine [..]
It is necessary to lay down the conditions under which Bulgaria should apply emergency vaccination.
Es necesario establecer las condiciones en que Bulgaria debe aplicar la vacunación de urgencia.
-
vacuna
The vaccination left a funny little mark on my arm.
La vacuna me dejó una marquita rara en el brazo.
-
inoculaciónnoun feminine
Whether or not double vaccination of males can replace castration only time will tell.
En el futuro ya se verá en qué medida se sustituye la castración quirúrgica por la doble inoculación.
-
